title: Ruling on putting Stickers of Shahadah or Ma Sha Allah on Car? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: muhammad from the philippines and my second question uh is it permissible to buy and put stickers that says for example the shahada or sticker that says masha'allah on the car i see cars have like this so is this permissible here okay i will answer you inshallah the question is what's the ruling on hanging a sticker so sometimes we see in cars stickers saying or ash muhammad what's the ruling on such stickers i would say that this is permissible especially if it were to be with the intention of giving dawah and calling people to islam however they should be in a proper place not in a low place not in a place where they can be dirt on them or filth coming onto them so putting them on top of your back uh rear window might be okay because this is always kept clean and away from dirt and allah azzawajal knows best you
